subject: Sales
title: Fear of Rejection in Sales
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Fear of Rejection in Sales.

hook.text: A new rep makes ten cold calls, gets nine rejections, and quits by Friday. The tenth would have said yes.

buildup.text: Rejection sensitivity ends more sales careers than poor technique ever does.

discovery.text: Top sellers reframe every rejection. Each 'no' isn't personal â€” it's data about timing or fit.

twist.text: Research shows rejection stings less when expected. The best sellers plan for it in advance.

climax.text: Track your no-to-yes ratio. See the pattern. Rejection becomes just a step in the math.

punchline.text: Every 'no' is one step closer to the next 'yes.'

quiz.question: How do top sellers handle rejection?
options: They reframe it as data about timing or fit
